question: Who represented India in the recently held G-20 Education Ministers meeting?
option4: Union Women and Child Development Minister
explanation:
The G20 Education Ministers was held virtually, where India was represented by Union Minister of Education, Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank.
During the meeting, member countries resolved to work together shared best practices in three identified areas namely Education continuity in times of crises, Early childhood education and Internationalization in education.
